text: The 2008–09 Chicago Blackhawks season is the team's 82nd season in the National Hockey League (NHL). == Regular season == ==Playoffs== The Blackhawks beat the Calgary Flames in the Conference Quarter-Finals 4 games to 2, and the Vancouver Canucks 4 games to 2 in the Conference Semi-Finals, but lost to the Detroit Red Wings in the Conference Finals 1 game to 4. ==References== Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:2009 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2000s in Chicago Category:2008 in Illinois Category:2009 in Illinois
title: 2008–09 Chicago Blackhawks season
